<seg xml:id="C26_app303-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0106__main__24"/>Begone, <seg xml:id="C26_app303-fMS_end"/> I am <seg xml:id="C26_app305-fMS_start"/> firm <seg xml:id="C26_app305-fMS_end"/> and your words will <lb n="c57-0106__main__25"/>only exasperate my <seg xml:id="C26_app307-fMS_start"/> rage. <seg xml:id="C26_app307-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0106__main__26"/>The Monster saw my determination <lb n="c57-0106__main__27"/>in my <seg xml:id="C26_app309-fMS_start"/> face <seg xml:id="C26_app309-fMS_end"/> and gnashed his teeth in the <lb n="c57-0106__main__28"/>impotence of anger. <seg xml:id="C26_app311-fMS_start"/> Shall <seg xml:id="C26_app311-fMS_end"/> each <seg xml:id="C26_app313-fMS_start"/> man, <seg xml:id="C26_app313-fMS_end"/> cried <lb n="c57-0106__main__29"/>he, <seg xml:id="C26_app315-fMS_start"/> find <seg xml:id="C26_app315-fMS_end"/> his <seg xml:id="C26_app317-fMS_start"/> equal, <seg xml:id="C26_app317-fMS_end"/> & each beast have <lb n="c57-0106__main__30"/>his <seg xml:id="C26_app319-fMS_start"/> mate <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0106__main__d4e19688">I</del> <seg xml:id="C26_app319-fMS_end"/> and I be <seg xml:id="C26_app321-fMS_start"/> alone. <seg xml:id="C26_app321-fMS_end"/> I had feelings <lb n="c57-0106__main__31"/>of <seg xml:id="C26_app323-fMS_start"/> affection <seg xml:id="C26_app323-fMS_end"/> & they were <seg xml:id="C26_app325-fMS_start"/> returned <seg xml:id="C26_app325-fMS_end"/> by <seg xml:id="C26_app327-fMS_start"/> <w ana="start"/>detes<lb n="c57-0106__main__32"/>tation<w ana="end"/>. <seg xml:id="C26_app518-fMS_start"/> death <lb n="c57-0109__main__27"/>knell, <seg xml:id="C26_app518-fMS_end"/> they appeared like a dream, yet <lb n="c57-0109__main__28"/>distinct and <seg xml:id="C26_app520-fMS_start"/> o <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20103"/>p <sga-add eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20103"/>pressive <seg xml:id="C26_app520-fMS_end"/> as a reality. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0109__main__29"/>The <seg xml:id="C26_app522-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0109__main__d4e20110">T</del> sun <seg xml:id="C26_app522-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app523-fMS_start"/> was <seg xml:id="C26_app523-fMS_end"/> far <seg xml:id="C26_app525-fMS_start"/> descended <seg xml:id="C26_app525-fMS_end"/> and I still <lb n="c57-0109__main__30"/>sat on the <seg xml:id="C26_app527-fMS_start"/> shore <seg xml:id="C26_app527-fMS_end"/> satisfying my <seg xml:id="C26_app529-fMS_start"/> ap <mod sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20116"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20118"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20118"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20124"/>p <sga-add eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20124"/><mod eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20116"/> etite <seg xml:id="C26_app529-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0109__main__31"/>which <seg xml:id="C26_app531-fMS_start"/> was <seg xml:id="C26_app531-fMS_end"/> become <seg xml:id="C26_app533-fMS_start"/> ravenous <seg xml:id="C26_app533-fMS_end"/> with an <lb n="c57-0109__main__32"/>oaten <seg xml:id="C26_app535-fMS_start"/> cake <seg xml:id="C26_app535-fMS_end"/> when I saw a <seg xml:id="C26_app537-fMS_start"/> fishing <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0109__main__d4e20132">boat</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0109__main__d4e20135">sk</del> boat <seg xml:id="C26_app537-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0109__main__33"/>land close to <seg xml:id="C26_app539-fMS_start"/> me <seg xml:id="C26_app539-fMS_end"/> & one of the men brought <lb n="c57-0109__main__34"/>me a packet; it contained letters from <seg xml:id="C26_app541-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0109__main__35"/>Geneva <seg xml:id="C26_app541-fMS_end"/> & one from <seg xml:id="C26_app543-fMS_start"/> Cl <mod sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20145"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20149"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20149"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0109__main__d4e20155"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20155"/><mod eID="c57-0109__main__d4e20145"/> rval <seg xml:id="C26_app543-fMS_end"/> entreating me <lb n="c57-0109__main__36"/>to <seg xml:id="C26_app545-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0109__main__d4e20161">g</del> join him. He said <seg xml:id="C26_app545-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app546-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0109__main__d4e20165">a</del> that <seg xml:id="C26_app546-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app547-fMS_start"/> nearly a<zone eID="c57-0109__main"/> <surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0109"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partOf="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="55v" shelfmark="MS. Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0110.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sID="c57-0110__main"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__1"/>year had <mod sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20178"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20180">passed</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20183"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20183"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20189"/>elapsed <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20189"/> <mod eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20178"/> since we had quitted Switzerland <lb n="c57-0110__main__2"/>and France was yet unvisited. <seg xml:id="C26_app547-fMS_end"/> He entreated <seg xml:id="C26_app549-fMS_start"/> me <lb n="c57-0110__main__3"/>therefore to <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20197">return</del> <seg xml:id="C26_app549-fMS_end"/> leave my solitary <seg xml:id="C26_app551-fMS_start"/> isle <seg xml:id="C26_app551-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__4"/>and <seg xml:id="C26_app553-fMS_start"/> meet him at <seg xml:id="C26_app553-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app554-fMS_start"/> Perth in a week from that <lb n="c57-0110__main__5"/>time when <seg xml:id="C26_app554-fMS_end"/> we might <seg xml:id="C26_app556-fMS_start"/> arrange <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20205">our</del> the plan <lb n="c57-0110__main__6"/>of our future proceedings. <seg xml:id="C26_app556-fMS_end"/> This letter <seg xml:id="C26_app558-fMS_start"/> <w ana="start"/>complete<lb n="c57-0110__main__7"/>ly<w ana="end"/> recalled <mod sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20217"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20219"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="C26_app558-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20219"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20225"/>me <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20225"/><mod eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20217"/>to <seg xml:id="C26_app561-fMS_start"/> life <seg xml:id="C26_app561-fMS_end"/> & I determined to quit my <lb n="c57-0110__main__8"/>island <seg xml:id="C26_app563-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20231">the next day</del> . at the expiration of two <seg xml:id="C26_app563-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app564-fMS_start"/> days <seg xml:id="C26_app564-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C26_app566-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__9"/>Yet <seg xml:id="C26_app566-fMS_end"/> before I <seg xml:id="C26_app568-fMS_start"/> departed <seg xml:id="C26_app568-fMS_end"/> there was a task <lb n="c57-0110__main__10"/>to <seg xml:id="C26_app570-fMS_start"/> perform <seg xml:id="C26_app570-fMS_end"/> on which I shuddered to <seg xml:id="C26_app572-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20241">think</del> <lb n="c57-0110__main__11"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0110.02"/> <zone corresp="#c57-0110.02" type="left_margin" sID="c57-0110__left_margin"/> <lb n="c57-0110__left_margin__1"/> <sga-add sID="c57-0110__left_margin__d4e20252"/>reflect: <sga-add eID="c57-0110__left_margin__d4e20252"/> <zone eID="c57-0110__left_margin"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0110.01"/>I must pack <seg xml:id="C26_app572-fMS_end"/> my chemical <seg xml:id="C26_app574-fMS_start"/> instruments <seg xml:id="C26_app574-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__12"/>& for that purpose I must enter the room <lb n="c57-0110__main__13"/>which had been the scene of my odious <lb n="c57-0110__main__14"/>work, <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20264"/>&<sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20264"/> I must handle <seg xml:id="C26_app576-fMS_start"/> the utensils <seg xml:id="C26_app576-fMS_end"/> the sight <lb n="c57-0110__main__15"/>of which <seg xml:id="C26_app578-fMS_start"/> were <seg xml:id="C26_app578-fMS_end"/> sickening to me. The <lb n="c57-0110__main__16"/>next <seg xml:id="C26_app580-fMS_start"/> morning <seg xml:id="C26_app580-fMS_end"/> at <seg xml:id="C26_app582-fMS_start"/> daybreak <seg xml:id="C26_app582-fMS_end"/> I summoned <lb n="c57-0110__main__17"/>sufficient <seg xml:id="C26_app584-fMS_start"/> courage <seg xml:id="C26_app584-fMS_end"/> & unlocked the door <lb n="c57-0110__main__18"/>of my <seg xml:id="C26_app586-fMS_start"/> work room – <seg xml:id="C26_app586-fMS_end"/> The remains of the <seg xml:id="C26_app588-fMS_start"/> half <w ana="start"/>fi<lb n="c57-0110__main__19"/>nished<w ana="end"/> creature <seg xml:id="C26_app588-fMS_end"/> whom I had <seg xml:id="C26_app590-fMS_start"/> destroyed <seg xml:id="C26_app590-fMS_end"/> lay <lb n="c57-0110__main__20"/>scattered on the <seg xml:id="C26_app592-fMS_start"/> floor – <seg xml:id="C26_app592-fMS_end"/> & I almost felt as <lb n="c57-0110__main__21"/>if I <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20287"/>had <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20287"/>mangled the living flesh of a human <lb n="c57-0110__main__22"/>being. I paused to collect <seg xml:id="C26_app595-fMS_start"/> myself <seg xml:id="C26_app595-fMS_end"/> & then <lb n="c57-0110__main__23"/>entered the chamber. With trembling <seg xml:id="C26_app597-fMS_start"/> hands <seg xml:id="C26_app597-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__24"/>I conveyed the instruments out of the <seg xml:id="C26_app599-fMS_start"/> room <seg xml:id="C26_app599-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__25"/>but I reflected that I ought not to leave <lb n="c57-0110__main__26"/>the <seg xml:id="C26_app601-fMS_start"/> relicks <seg xml:id="C26_app601-fMS_end"/> of my work to excite the horror <lb n="c57-0110__main__27"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20303"/>& suspicion <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20303"/>of the <seg xml:id="C26_app603-fMS_start"/> peasants <seg xml:id="C26_app603-fMS_end"/> and I accordingly put them <lb n="c57-0110__main__28"/>into a <seg xml:id="C26_app605-fMS_start"/> basket <seg xml:id="C26_app605-fMS_end"/> with a great quantity of <seg xml:id="C26_app607-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__29"/>stones <seg xml:id="C26_app607-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app608-fMS_start"/> and <seg xml:id="C26_app608-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app609-fMS_start"/> tying it up <seg xml:id="C26_app609-fMS_end"/> determined to throw <lb n="c57-0110__main__30"/>them into the sea that very <seg xml:id="C26_app611-fMS_start"/> night <seg xml:id="C26_app611-fMS_end"/> and <lb n="c57-0110__main__31"/>in the mean time <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0110__main__d4e20315"/>I <sga-add eID="c57-0110__main__d4e20315"/>sat <seg xml:id="C26_app614-fMS_start"/> on <seg xml:id="C26_app614-fMS_end"/> the <seg xml:id="C26_app616-fMS_start"/> beach <seg xml:id="C26_app616-fMS_end"/> <w ana="start"/>em<lb n="c57-0110__main__32"/>ployed<w ana="end"/> in cleaning & arranging my chemical <lb n="c57-0110__main__33"/>apparatus. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0110__main__34"/>Nothing <seg xml:id="C26_app618-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0110__main__d4e20331">w</del> could be more complete than <lb n="c57-0110__main__35"/>the alteration that had taken place in <lb n="c57-0111__main__1"/>my feelings since the night of the <w ana="start"/>ap<lb n="c57-0111__main__2"/>pearance<w ana="end"/> of the dæmon. I had before <lb n="c57-0111__main__3"/>regarded my promise with <seg xml:id="C26_app618-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app619-fMS_start"/> gloomy despair <seg xml:id="C26_app619-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__4"/>as a <seg xml:id="C26_app621-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20357">n</del> thing <seg xml:id="C26_app621-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app622-fMS_start"/> that must <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20360">at</del> <seg xml:id="C26_app622-fMS_end"/> with whatever <seg xml:id="C26_app624-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__5"/>consequences <seg xml:id="C26_app624-fMS_end"/> be <seg xml:id="C26_app626-fMS_start"/> fulfilled <seg xml:id="C26_app626-fMS_end"/> but I now felt <lb n="c57-0111__main__6"/>as if a film had been taken from before <lb n="c57-0111__main__7"/>my <seg xml:id="C26_app628-fMS_start"/> eyes <seg xml:id="C26_app628-fMS_end"/> & that <seg xml:id="C26_app630-fMS_start"/> I now <seg xml:id="C26_app630-fMS_end"/> for the first <seg xml:id="C26_app632-fMS_start"/> time <seg xml:id="C26_app632-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__8"/>saw clearly. <seg xml:id="C26_app634-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20372">It never once</del> The idea of <lb n="c57-0111__main__9"/>renewing my labours did not for <seg xml:id="C26_app634-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app635-fMS_start"/> an <seg xml:id="C26_app635-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__10"/>instant occur to <seg xml:id="C26_app637-fMS_start"/> me. <seg xml:id="C26_app637-fMS_end"/> The threat I had <lb n="c57-0111__main__11"/>heard weighed on my <seg xml:id="C26_app639-fMS_start"/> thoughts <seg xml:id="C26_app639-fMS_end"/> but I <seg xml:id="C26_app641-fMS_start"/> <del next="#c57-0111.02" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20381">never</del> <sga-add next="#c57-0111.03" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0111__main__d4e20385"/>did <sga-add eID="c57-0111__main__d4e20385"/><lb n="c57-0111__main__12"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0111.04"/><lb n="c57-0111__left_margin__1"/><sga-add xml:id="c57-0111.03" sID="c57-0111__left_margin__d4e20396"/>not reflect <seg xml:id="C26_app641-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app642-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0111__left_margin__d4e20396"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20400">suppose</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20403">d</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0111.01"/> that a voluntary act of mine <seg xml:id="C26_app642-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app643-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__13"/>might <seg xml:id="C26_app643-fMS_end"/> avert it. I had resolved in my <lb n="c57-0111__main__14"/>own <seg xml:id="C26_app645-fMS_start"/> mind <seg xml:id="C26_app645-fMS_end"/> that to create another like <lb n="c57-0111__main__15"/>the fiend I had first made would be <lb n="c57-0111__main__16"/>an act of the basest & most atrocious <seg xml:id="C26_app647-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__17"/>selfishness <seg xml:id="C26_app647-fMS_end"/> and I <seg xml:id="C26_app649-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20420">did not</del> banished <lb n="c57-0111__main__18"/>from my mind every thought that <lb n="c57-0111__main__19"/>could lead to a different <seg xml:id="C26_app649-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app650-fMS_start"/> conclusion <seg xml:id="C26_app650-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__20"/>Between two & three in the morning <lb n="c57-0111__main__21"/>the moon <seg xml:id="C26_app652-fMS_start"/> rose <seg xml:id="C26_app652-fMS_end"/> and I <seg xml:id="C26_app654-fMS_start"/> then <seg xml:id="C26_app654-fMS_end"/> putting my <lb n="c57-0111__main__22"/>basket <seg xml:id="C26_app656-fMS_start"/> into <seg xml:id="C26_app656-fMS_end"/> a little <seg xml:id="C26_app658-fMS_start"/> skiff <seg xml:id="C26_app658-fMS_end"/> sailed out about <lb n="c57-0111__main__23"/>four miles from the <seg xml:id="C26_app660-fMS_start"/> shore – <seg xml:id="C26_app660-fMS_end"/> The scene <lb n="c57-0111__main__24"/>was perfectly <seg xml:id="C26_app662-fMS_start"/> solitary, <seg xml:id="C26_app662-fMS_end"/> a few boats were <lb n="c57-0111__main__25"/>returning towards <seg xml:id="C26_app664-fMS_start"/> land <seg xml:id="C26_app664-fMS_end"/> but I sailed <lb n="c57-0111__main__26"/>away from them. I felt as if I was <lb n="c57-0111__main__27"/>about the commission of a dreadful <seg xml:id="C26_app666-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0111__main__28"/>crime <seg xml:id="C26_app666-fMS_end"/> and avoided with shuddering <lb n="c57-0111__main__29"/>anxiety any encounter with my <seg xml:id="C26_app668-fMS_start"/> fellow <lb n="c57-0111__main__30"/>creatures. <seg xml:id="C26_app668-fMS_end"/> At one time the <seg xml:id="C26_app670-fMS_start"/> moon <seg xml:id="C26_app670-fMS_end"/> which <lb n="c57-0111__main__31"/>had before been <seg xml:id="C26_app672-fMS_start"/> clear <seg xml:id="C26_app672-fMS_end"/> was suddenly <seg xml:id="C26_app674-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0111__main__d4e20458">covered</del> <lb n="c57-0111__main__32"/>overspread by a thick <seg xml:id="C26_app674-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C26_app675-fMS_start"/> cloud <seg xml:id="C26_app675-fMS_end"/> &<mod sID="c57-0111__main__d4e20464"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0111__main__d4e20466"/> <seg xml:id="C26_app677-fMS_start"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0111__main__d4e20466"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0111__main__d4e20472"/>I <seg xml:id="C26_app677-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0111__main__d4e20472"/><mod eID="c57-0111__main__d4e20464"/>took <w ana="start"/>advan<lb n="c57-0111__main__33"/>tage<w ana="end"/> of the moment of <seg xml:id="C26_app679-fMS_start"/> darkness <seg xml:id="C26_app679-fMS_end"/> & <seg xml:id="C26_app681-fMS_start"/> cast<lb n="c57-0112__main__1"/>the <seg xml:id="C26_app681-fMS_end"/> basket into the <seg xml:id="C26_app683-fMS_start"/> sea – <seg xml:id="C26_app683-fMS_end"/> I listened to the <w ana="start"/>gurg<lb n="c57-0112__main__2"/>ling<w ana="end"/> sound as it <seg xml:id="C26_app685-fMS_start"/> sunk <seg xml:id="C26_app685-fMS_end"/> & then <seg xml:id="C26_app687-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0112__main__d4e20498"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0112__main__d4e20500"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0112__main__d4e20500"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0112__main__d4e20506"/>sailed <seg xml:id="C26_app687-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0112__main__d4e20506"/><mod eID="c57-0112__main__d4e20498"/>away from the <lb n="c57-0112__main__3"/>spot.
